
Steps to run the project
1. Donwload and unzip the file from this link: https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/getdata%2Fprojectfiles%2FUCI%20HAR%20Dataset.zip
2. Rename de folder with "dataproject"
3. Paste the file run_analysis.R in the same level of dataproject folder
4. Open run_analysis.R with R Studio
5. The script will generate two files merged_data.txt with the information and data_with_means.txt with the mean of the variables by subject and activity.
